title: Want *PRESTIGE* Pop-star Kai'sa? --- Week by Week Guide ---
body:
Interested in what it takes to get the prestige pop-star Kai’sa skin [2,500 tokens]? Here’s how on a week by week basis. 

*_Some event missions remain unannounced as to when they will take place in-game, but the majority seem easy enough to complete when they do happen. As such, they’ll be listed as default tokens earned by the END of the completion table. These missions are: Watch LoL E-sports (50 tokens), and the secret mission[s] confirmed by Riot (40 tokens). So let’s start!_

As you probably already know, in order to get the kai’sa skin, you also need tokens from additional games based on performance. Some way, somehow, if you do everything perfectly, you will still need to get a net of 1,210 ADDITIONAL tokens (or 202 extra per “week”). 

**Week 1: Sept. 27 – Oct. 7 **
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	Tokens from winning one game (1st mission): 10
-	Tokens from Purchase of Worlds 2018 Pass: 200
-	1st Win of Day (11 days): 165
-	Performance Score tokens: 202 
•	To be on track: **617**

**Week 2: Oct 8. – Oct 14**
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	Pick’ems (group stage bracket): 10
-	1st Win of the Day (7 days): 105
-	Performance Score tokens: 202
•	To be on track: **974**

**Week 3: Oct. 15 – Oct 21**
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	Pick’ems (Play-off stage bracket): 10
-	1st Win of the Day (7 days): 105
-	Performance Score tokens: 202
•	To be on track: **1,331**

**Week 4: Oct. 22 – Oct 28**
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	Tokens From Tales from the Rift: 40
-	1st Win of the Day (7 days): 105
-	Performance Score tokens: 202
•	To be on track: **1,718**

**Week 5: Oct. 29 – Nov. 4**
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	1st Win of the Day (7 days): 105
-	Performance Score tokens: 202
•	To be on track: **2,065**

**Week 6: Nov. 5 – Nov. 11**
-	Tokens from Missions: 40
-	1st Win of the Day (7 days): 105
-	Performance Score tokens: 202
•	To be on track: **2,412**

**Misc./Hidden Missions**
•	Bonus tokens (Watch LoL E-sports and secret mission[s]): 90 tokens
•	To Be on track: **2,502**


So how hard is it “REALLY” to get the extra tokens based on performance? Well, let’s assume you started a bit late and are taking up the task with 40 days left. 1,210/40 = 31 extra tokens per day. Let’s just say 8 tokens is the average per game you can gain (you can gauge how hard this is by yourself by looking at the table below)… it would be about 4 Summoner Rift games a day. So… roughly 2 hours of playing per day for 40 days. This also assumes you don’t want to spend the tokens on ANYTHING else. 

8 tokens on average would be like saying: you win 2 summoner's rift with at A- or higher and win 2 more with a B+ or below (so kind of optimistic, but it is in the ball park). But if the average was 6 tokens, then you win 2 summoner's rift with A- or higher and lose 2 with a B+ or below so that is only 1 extra game a day (not terrible). 


.................................................................................................................................................
..........................Summoner's Rift...............ARAM, Twisted Treeline, Rotating Game Mode	 
Rating.........................Win......Loss.............Win........Loss......................................................
S+, S, S-......................14............8...............10............6......................................................
A+, A, A-......................10............6................5.............4......................................................
B+ and below..............6.............3.................3.............1......................................................
..................................................................................................................................................

If you had a job and could only play 1 game through Monday-Thursday... then on Friday THROUGH Sunday you would need to play 24 games to make up for your absence IF your average Performance score income was sitting around 8 tokens a game. 

Hope this helps to anyone interested in the skin/battle pass,
~~~ Gradius III

Week 3 needed about 1300 tokens to be on track and we're almost done with week 4 which needs 1700 tokens. If you're able to collect 1,100 tokens by the end of this week, then you will still be about 75 games behind with 14 days remaining. In order to catch up to my safe schedule, that's about 8 or 9 games a day. (5 of those games are "make-up" games for being behind.)

If you decide to count on another week for the "after party" event, then you have to play about 6-7 games a day (3 of those games are "make-up" games.) You can always buy more tokens, but otherwise the grind will be relatively tough at this point. It is certainly possible, but I have no idea how busy your daily life is.

So I am super late to the party. I have 915 tokens at this time. Anyone think I can make it? How many games would I need? :/ I really like the skin and want it but sadly I was really busy first 2 weeks...

It is possible and how likely depends on how busy you will be for the upcoming weeks. Assuming you get a bolster of time, it is very possible since some people were able to get ahead by 300 tokens in just the first week alone. If you want to avoid paying RP and assume you make 8 tokens average per game, then you are about 50 games behind. Spread over the time period of a minimum of 3 weeks (possibly 4--- See my **UPDATE** section at the very bottom of the post), then assume 18 extra games per week. Basically, you'd have to play an extra game a day than what I already recommended above to be "safely" on track.

My update section simply lists a URL that suggests that Riot will extend the period to earn tokens with the after party event... in which case you have an extra week to gain tokens and are only a few games behind IF THAT IS THE CASE. This post is meant to be on the side of caution as opposed to cutting things close. 

If you don't make it but have around 2k tokens but no money for RP? Buy the position orbs (not world orbs) that will be released with the Tales from the Rift event since they will probably give you the most value for the tokens you earned.
